items.name: Anvil
items.base_effect: Weapon upgrades gain +1 to all stats
items.formula: Each weapon upgrade adds +1 extra to all stats
items.detailed_description: Permanently increases all weapon upgrade values by +1. This is a flat bonus that applies to every upgrade you take. Does NOT benefit from additional copies - one is enough!
items.notes: ONE-AND-DONE: Do not pick up multiple copies. The effect does not stack.

items.name: Beefy Ring
items.base_effect: +20% damage per 100 max HP
items.formula: Damage Multiplier = 1 + ((Max HP / 100) × 0.20 × Stack Count)
items.detailed_description: Scales your damage based on maximum HP. At 500 HP: 1 copy = +100% damage, 2 copies = +200% damage, 3 copies = +300% damage. Stacks incredibly well and synergizes with any HP-increasing items.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: Each copy adds another 20% damage per 100 HP. Essential for tank builds.

items.name: Big Bonk
items.base_effect: +2% chance to deal 20x damage
items.formula: Total Proc Chance = 0.02 × Stack Count (capped at 100%)
items.detailed_description: 2% chance per copy to deal massive 20x damage. With 10 copies, you have 20% chance. With 50 copies (theoretical), guaranteed 20x damage on every hit. Scales absurdly well with high attack speed weapons.
items.notes: SCALES ABSURDLY: Each copy adds 2% more chance. Becomes guaranteed at 50 copies.

items.name: Spicy Meatball
items.base_effect: +25% chance to explode on attack, dealing 65% AoE damage
items.formula: Explosion Chance = 0.25 × Stack Count (capped at 100%)
items.detailed_description: 25% chance per copy to create explosions dealing 65% of your damage in an area. With 4 copies, every attack explodes. Incredible for crowd control and screen clear.
items.notes: SCALES ABSURDLY: Reaches 100% proc rate at 4 copies. After that, consider other items.

items.name: Gym Sauce
items.base_effect: +10% damage
items.formula: Damage Multiplier = 1 + (0.10 × Stack Count)
items.detailed_description: Straightforward damage increase. Each copy adds +10%. With 10 copies, you gain +100% damage (2x multiplier). Always useful.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: Simple and effective. Always a good pick.

items.name: Forbidden Juice
items.base_effect: +10% critical chance
items.formula: Crit Chance = Base + (0.10 × Stack Count). Over 100% enables Overcrits!
items.detailed_description: Each copy adds +10% crit chance. Getting to 100%+ enables Overcrits which multiply damage exponentially (2 crits = 4x, 3 crits = 6.25x). Essential for crit builds.
items.notes: STACKS VERY WELL: Stack to 100%+ for Overcrit scaling. Game-changing mechanic.

items.name: Oats
items.base_effect: +25 maximum HP
items.formula: Max HP = Base HP + (25 × Stack Count)
items.detailed_description: Straightforward HP increase. Each copy adds +25 HP. With 10 copies, you gain +250 HP. Essential for survivability and Beefy Ring synergy.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: More HP = more survivability and Beefy Ring damage.

items.name: Sucky Magnet
items.unlock_requirement: Complete all shrines on one map
items.base_effect: Periodically drags all XP gems to you
items.formula: Automatic XP collection on cooldown
items.detailed_description: Automatically pulls all XP on screen to your location periodically. Incredibly convenient for leveling. Additional copies do NOT reduce cooldown or increase range.
items.notes: ONE-AND-DONE: Do not pick up multiple copies. One is perfect.

items.name: Za Warudo
items.base_effect: Freeze time when damage would kill you (one-time use per run)
items.formula: Number of Lives = Stack Count
items.detailed_description: When you would die, time freezes and you survive. Each copy grants one additional use (extra life). With 3 copies, you can survive 3 fatal hits per run.
items.notes: STACKS MODERATELY: Each copy = one more life. Useful but has diminishing returns.

items.name: Holy Book
items.unlock_requirement: Kill first stage boss without taking damage
items.base_effect: +100 Max HP, +50 HP regen; healing radiates damage to nearby enemies
items.formula: HP = +100/stack, Regen = +50/stack, Overheal = +25%/stack, Radius = 5m + 1m/stack. Damage = f(healing, level)
items.detailed_description: Massive HP, regen, and overheal boost. Healing radiates damage to enemies. CRITICAL: Acts as a 5th weapon - the healing damage can crit and proc other items like Ice Cube and Bonkhammer. This is why Holy Book is meta-defining.
items.notes: META-DEFINING: Acts as 5th weapon. Can proc Ice Cube, Bonkhammer, etc. Insane with HP builds.
hidden_mechanics: ACTS AS 5TH WEAPON - healing damage can crit and proc other items
Can trigger Ice Cube, Bonkhammer, and other on-hit effects
Damage dealt every 1.5 seconds based on healing done
Damage formula scales with level and total healing in time window
Overheal creates yellow bar beyond max HP

items.name: Chonkplate
items.base_effect: Overheal up to 75% beyond max HP; +20% lifesteal
items.formula: Overheal = Max HP × 0.75 × Stack Count, Lifesteal = 0.20 × Stack Count
items.detailed_description: With 400 HP and 1 copy: +300 overheal shield. With 2 copies: +600 overheal. Lifesteal stacks additively. Insane survivability.
items.notes: STACKS VERY WELL: Each copy effectively doubles your HP pool.

items.name: Demonic Soul
items.base_effect: +0.1% damage per kill (max 100% per copy)
items.formula: Damage = 1 + (Kills × 0.001 × Stack Count), max 1000 kills per copy
items.detailed_description: Gains +0.1% damage per kill, capping at +100% per copy (1000 kills). With 2 copies, you can reach +200% damage total. Scales throughout the run.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: Each copy adds another 100% potential damage. Strong in extended runs.

items.name: Overpowered Lamp
items.base_effect: +1 extra chance to proc on-hit effects
items.formula: Each on-hit effect rolls (1 + Stack Count) times
items.detailed_description: Makes every on-hit effect roll twice per stack. With Thunder Mitts: 1 lamp = 2 lightning strikes per proc. 2 lamps = 3 strikes. Multiplies all proc-based items.
items.notes: STACKS EXTREMELY WELL: Each copy adds another proc roll. Game-breaking with proc items.

items.name: Cursed Doll
items.base_effect: Curse an enemy, dealing 30% of their Max HP every second
items.formula: Enemies Cursed = 2-6 base + 2 per additional copy. Boss damage heavily reduced by level.
items.detailed_description: Curse enemies dealing 30% of their max HP per second (non-bosses die in ~4 sec). STACKS: Each copy curses +2 more enemies. WARNING: Boss damage is heavily reduced based on level - not as strong vs bosses as the description implies.
items.notes: DOES STACK: Each copy = +2 enemies cursed. Boss damage is nerfed by level.
hidden_mechanics: Base enemies cursed is 2-6 (possibly bugged - intended may be 2)
Each additional copy adds +2 more enemies that can be cursed
Boss damage is HEAVILY reduced based on your level
Non-bosses die in ~4 seconds regardless of HP
30% max HP/second only applies at full strength to normal enemies
items.boss_formula: Boss damage scales with level (significantly reduced). See damage table.

items.name: Lightning Orb
items.base_effect: +25% chance to summon lightning on hit; stuns enemies
items.formula: Lightning Chance = 0.25 × Stack Count (capped at 100%)
items.detailed_description: 25% chance to summon stunning lightning. With 4 copies, every attack triggers lightning. Excellent crowd control and damage.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: Reaches 100% at 4 copies. Consider stopping there.

items.name: Turbo Skates
items.unlock_requirement: Upgrade both cooldown and agility tomes to level 5
items.base_effect: Movement speed grants attack speed (max +40% per stack)
items.formula: Attack Speed Bonus = min(Movement Speed × Stack Count, 40% × Stack Count)
items.detailed_description: Converts movement speed into attack speed, up to +40% per copy. With 100% movement speed and 2 copies: +80% attack speed. Incredible for speed builds.
items.notes: STACKS VERY WELL: Each copy adds another +40% potential attack speed.

items.name: Grandma's Secret Tonic
items.base_effect: Crits have 50% chance to explode in 4m radius dealing 50% crit damage
items.formula: Radius = 4m + (Stack Count - 1), capped at 8m. First copy: +2% crit
items.detailed_description: Crits have 50% chance to explode dealing 50% crit damage in a radius. Each copy increases radius by 1m (4m to 8m max). HARD CAP: 5 copies - additional copies provide zero benefit. First copy only grants +2% crit chance.
items.notes: HARD CAP at 5 copies. Additional copies do NOTHING. First copy gives +2% crit.
hidden_mechanics: First copy ONLY gives +2% crit chance bonus - additional copies do NOT add more crit
Radius caps at 8m (5 copies) - 6th+ copies do NOTHING
Explosion deals 50% of your crit damage to nearby enemies

items.name: Ice Cube
items.base_effect: +20% chance to deal ice damage and freeze enemies
items.formula: Freeze Chance = 0.20 × Stack Count (capped at 100%)
items.detailed_description: 20% chance to freeze enemies. With 5 copies, every attack freezes. Incredible crowd control.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: Reaches 100% at 5 copies for perma-freeze.

items.name: Dragonfire
items.base_effect: +15% chance to summon dragonfire on hit; applies burn
items.formula: Dragonfire Chance = 0.15 × Stack Count (capped at 100%)
items.detailed_description: 15% chance to spawn dragonfire that burns enemies. With 7 copies, guaranteed dragonfire. Strong DoT damage.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: Reaches 100% at 7 copies. Good for burn builds.

items.name: Beer
items.base_effect: +20% damage; -5% max HP penalty
items.formula: Damage = 1 + (0.20 × Stacks), Max HP = Base × (1 - 0.05 × Stacks)
items.detailed_description: Each copy adds +20% damage but reduces max HP by 5%. With 5 copies: +100% damage but -25% HP. Risk/reward tradeoff.
items.notes: RISKY STACKING: More copies = more damage but significantly less HP. Balance carefully.

items.name: Demonic Blood
items.unlock_requirement: Increase max HP 400 times with blood magic
items.base_effect: +0.5 Max HP per kill (max 200 stacks per copy)
items.formula: HP Gain = min(Kills × 0.5 × Stack Count, 100 × Stack Count)
items.detailed_description: Gains +0.5 HP per kill, capping at +100 HP per copy (200 kills). With 3 copies, you can gain up to +300 HP throughout the run.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: Each copy adds another 100 HP potential. Great for scaling builds.

items.name: Turbo Socks
items.base_effect: +15% movement speed
items.formula: Movement Speed = Base × (1 + 0.15 × Stack Count)
items.detailed_description: Each copy adds +15% movement speed. With 5 copies: +75% movement speed. Great for kiting and Turbo Skates synergy.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: More speed = better positioning and Turbo Skates value.

items.name: Battery
items.base_effect: +8% attack speed
items.formula: Attack Speed = Base × (1 + 0.08 × Stack Count)
items.detailed_description: Each copy adds +8% attack speed. With 10 copies: +80% attack speed. Essential for DPS builds.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: More attacks = more damage and more procs.

items.name: Medkit
items.base_effect: +35 HP regeneration per minute
items.formula: HP Regen = Base + (35 × Stack Count)
items.detailed_description: Each copy adds +35 HP regen per minute. With 10 copies: +350 regen. Decent for sustain builds.
items.notes: STACKS MODERATELY: Useful for sustain but not game-changing.

items.name: Clover
items.base_effect: +7.5% luck
items.formula: Luck = Base + (0.075 × Stack Count)
items.detailed_description: Each copy adds +7.5% luck for better item drops. Note: Luck does NOT affect proc chances or crit chance, only drop rarity.
items.notes: STACKS MODERATELY: Useful but not essential for combat power.

items.name: Moldy Cheese
items.base_effect: +40% chance to poison enemies on hit
items.formula: Poison Chance = 0.40 × Stack Count (capped at 100%)
items.detailed_description: 40% chance to poison. With 3 copies, guaranteed poison on every hit. Strong DoT damage.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: Reaches 100% at 3 copies. Excellent for poison builds.

items.name: Borgar
items.base_effect: +2% chance to spawn Borgar upon killing an enemy
items.formula: Borgar Spawn Chance = 0.02 × Stack Count
items.detailed_description: Spawns a cosmetic Borgar on kills. Provides no combat benefit. Fun but not useful.
items.notes: AVOID STACKING: Purely cosmetic, wastes item slots.

items.name: Boss Buster
items.unlock_requirement: Defeat stage boss in under 30 seconds
items.base_effect: +15% more damage to Elites and Bosses
items.formula: Elite Damage Multiplier = 1 + (0.15 × Stack Count)
items.detailed_description: Each copy adds +15% damage vs elites/bosses. With 5 copies: +75% damage. Essential for boss rushes.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: Great for boss-focused builds.

items.name: Spiky Shield
items.base_effect: +2 thorns per 1% armor; +10% armor base
items.formula: Armor = Base + (0.10 × Stacks), Thorns = (Armor% × 2 × Stacks)
items.detailed_description: Converts armor into thorns damage (2:1 ratio) and adds base armor. With 50% armor and 2 copies: +200 thorns. Tanky damage reflection.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: Each copy doubles thorns potential.

items.name: Joe's Dagger
items.base_effect: +1% execute chance; damage increases +1% per execute (capped at +200% per minute per dagger)
items.formula: Execute Chance = 0.01 × Stacks, Damage = 1 + (Executes × 0.01 × Stacks)
items.detailed_description: 1% execute chance per copy. Each execute permanently adds +1% damage (capped at +200% per dagger per minute). Scales slowly but can become powerful.
items.notes: STACKS MODERATELY: More copies = more execute chance and higher damage cap. Slow ramp.

items.name: Bloody Cleaver
items.base_effect: Lifesteal activates bloodmark; +50% bloodmark chance
items.formula: Bloodmark Chance = 50% per copy. >100% = multiple bloodmarks per hit. 4 copies = 2 marks/hit.
items.detailed_description: 50% additive bloodmark chance per copy. At 200% (4 copies), each hit applies 2 bloodmark stacks. Stacks reset the explosion timer. Damage scales with your damage modifier, level, and total blood stacks. Extremely strong for sustained DPS.
items.notes: SCALES BEYOND 100%: 4 copies = 2 bloodmarks per hit. Timer resets on new stacks.
hidden_mechanics: Bloodmark chance is ADDITIVE and can exceed 100%
200% = 2 bloodmark stacks applied per hit
Bloodmark timer (4-5 sec) RESETS when new stacks are applied
Bloodmark explosion damage = damage_modifier x level x stacks
Visible as dark red section on boss HP bars

items.name: Soul Harvester
items.base_effect: Summon 2 homing souls per kill
items.formula: Souls per Kill = 2 × Stack Count
items.detailed_description: Each copy spawns 2 additional souls per kill. With 5 copies: 10 souls per kill. Creates a massive soul swarm.
items.notes: STACKS VERY WELL: Each copy doubles soul generation. Creates satisfying soul storms.

items.name: Energy Core
items.base_effect: Shoot energy orbs at enemies automatically
items.formula: Number of Orbs = Stack Count
items.detailed_description: Each copy adds another energy orb that auto-fires. With 5 copies: 5 orbs constantly shooting. Great passive damage.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: More copies = more orbs = more damage.

items.name: Speed Boi
items.base_effect: Slow time + 2x damage when below 50% HP
items.formula: Damage Multiplier when <50% HP = 1 + (1.0 × Stack Count)
items.detailed_description: When below 50% HP: slow time and gain 2x damage per copy. With 3 copies at low HP: 6x damage. High risk, high reward.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: Massive damage when low HP. Requires careful play.

items.name: Giant Fork
items.base_effect: +8% megacrit proc chance (hyperbolic)
items.formula: Megacrit Chance = Internal / (1 + Internal), where Internal = 8% per stack
items.detailed_description: Chance to convert crits into megacrits for massive damage. Uses hyperbolic scaling with diminishing returns - can never reach 100% regardless of stacks.
items.notes: HYPERBOLIC SCALING: Displayed 8% per stack has diminishing returns. Can't reach 100%.
hidden_mechanics: Uses hyperbolic formula: Actual = Internal / (1 + Internal)
1 stack (8% internal) = ~7.4% actual megacrit chance
5 stacks (40% internal) = ~28.6% actual megacrit chance
10 stacks (80% internal) = ~44.4% actual megacrit chance
Can never reach 100% megacrit chance regardless of stacks

items.name: Power Gloves
items.base_effect: +8% chance for giant blast on hit; strong knockback
items.formula: Blast Chance = 0.08 × Stack Count
items.detailed_description: 8% chance per copy to create blast with knockback. With 13 copies: guaranteed blast. Good crowd control.
items.notes: STACKS MODERATELY: Needs many copies to reach high proc rate.

items.name: Backpack
items.base_effect: +1 projectile count for all weapons
items.formula: Projectile Count = Base + Stack Count
items.detailed_description: Each copy adds +1 projectile to all weapons. With 5 copies: +5 projectiles. Multiplies damage output significantly.
items.notes: STACKS VERY WELL: Each projectile is a full damage instance. Excellent scaling.

items.name: Tactical Glasses
items.base_effect: +20% damage to enemies above 90% HP
items.formula: Damage Bonus vs Full HP = 0.20 × Stack Count
items.detailed_description: Only works on nearly-full-HP enemies. Each copy adds +20%. With 5 copies: +100% first-hit damage. Situational.
items.notes: SITUATIONAL STACKING: Only affects opening damage. Limited use.

items.name: Wrench
items.base_effect: Charge shrines 4% faster and get 7.5% increased rewards
items.formula: Charge Speed = 1 + (0.04 × Stacks), Rewards = 1 + (0.075 × Stacks)
items.detailed_description: Speeds shrine charging and increases rewards. With 5 copies: 20% faster, 37.5% more rewards. Nice utility.
items.notes: STACKS MODERATELY: Useful but not combat-focused.

items.name: Slippery Ring
items.base_effect: +15% evasion
items.formula: Evasion = Internal / (1 + Internal), where Internal = 0.15 × Stacks
items.detailed_description: Evasion has diminishing returns due to hyperbolic scaling. Can't reach 100%. With 7 copies (~105% internal): ~51% actual evasion.
items.notes: STACKS WITH DIMINISHING RETURNS: Good up to ~50-60% evasion, then diminishes heavily.
hidden_mechanics: Uses hyperbolic formula: Actual = Internal / (1 + Internal)
1 stack (15% internal) = ~13% actual evasion
7 stacks (105% internal) = ~51% actual evasion
Can never reach 100% evasion regardless of stacks

items.name: Golden Glove
items.base_effect: +15% more Gold from killing enemies
items.formula: Gold Multiplier = 1 + (0.15 × Stack Count)
items.detailed_description: Each copy adds +15% gold gain. With 5 copies: +75% gold. Useful for economy but not combat power.
items.notes: STACKS MODERATELY: Good for gold farming but doesn't improve combat.

items.name: Time Bracelet
items.base_effect: +8% XP Gain
items.formula: XP Multiplier = min(1 + (0.08 × Stacks), 10.0)
items.detailed_description: Each copy adds +8% XP gain. CAPPED AT 10x TOTAL (1000% XP). With 12 copies, you hit the cap. Beyond that, no benefit.
items.notes: STACKS WELL UP TO CAP: After 12 copies (1000% XP), stop taking this item.

items.name: Eagle Claw
items.base_effect: Enemies in the air take +66% damage; 8% chance to launch enemies upward
items.formula: Airborne Damage = 1 + (0.66 × Stacks), Launch Chance = 0.08 × Stacks
items.detailed_description: Enemies in air take +66% damage per copy. Also 8% chance to launch enemies. With 2 copies: +132% airborne damage and 16% launch chance. Creates combo loop.
items.notes: STACKS VERY WELL: More copies = more airborne damage and higher launch chance for self-sustaining combo.

items.name: Gamer Goggles
items.unlock_requirement: Win a run with less than 30% HP
items.base_effect: Damage increases as HP decreases (up to +100% at 1 HP per copy)
items.formula: Damage Bonus = (1 - Current HP% / Max HP%) × 1.0 × Stacks
items.detailed_description: At 1 HP: +100% damage per copy. At 50% HP: +50% damage per copy. With 2 copies at 1 HP: +200% damage. High risk, high reward.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: Massive damage scaling when low HP. Requires careful play.

items.name: Gas Mask
items.base_effect: Immunity to poison; +10 armor and +10 overheal per poisoned enemy
items.formula: Armor = 10 × Poisoned Enemies × Stacks, Overheal = 10 × Poisoned Enemies × Stacks
items.detailed_description: Grants immunity to poison plus armor/overheal based on poisoned enemy count. With 20 poisoned enemies and 2 copies: +400 armor, +400 overheal. Insane with poison builds.
items.notes: STACKS EXTREMELY WELL: Essential for Kevin poison builds. Creates invincible AFK playstyle.

items.name: Cursed Grabbies
items.base_effect: +10% difficulty, -20% max HP, 5% chance to cast cursed magic on hit
items.formula: Curse Proc = Internal / (1 + Internal), where Internal = 5% per stack. Max 50% (never reached)
items.detailed_description: Each copy: +10% difficulty, -20% HP, +5% curse proc chance (hyperbolic). Due to diminishing returns, actual proc chance is lower than displayed. 10 stacks shows 50% but actual is ~33%. Damage scales linearly. Anti-synergy with HP-dependent builds.
items.notes: HYPERBOLIC SCALING: Displayed % is misleading. Conflicts with Holy Book (reduces HP).
hidden_mechanics: Displayed 5% per stack uses hyperbolic formula - actual chance is lower
1 stack = ~4.8% actual (not 5% displayed)
Theoretical max 50% proc chance (can never reach)
Damage scales linearly with stack count
HP reduction (0.8x) conflicts with Holy Book builds

items.name: Shattered Knowledge
items.base_effect: XP shards damage enemies as they fly toward you
items.formula: XP Shard Damage = Base Damage × Stack Count
items.detailed_description: XP shards become weapons. Each copy doubles XP shard damage. With high attraction range and 3 copies, creates a constant damage field.
items.notes: STACKS VERY WELL: More copies = more XP shard damage. Great passive DPS.

items.name: Slutty Cannon
items.base_effect: +20% chance to launch rockets when killing an enemy
items.formula: Rocket Chance = 0.20 × Stack Count (capped at 100%)
items.detailed_description: 20% chance to launch rocket on kill. With 5 copies, every kill launches a rocket. Creates chain reaction explosions.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: Reaches 100% at 5 copies for guaranteed rockets on every kill.

items.name: Toxic Barrel
items.base_effect: Creates poison cloud when you take damage
items.formula: Poison Cloud Size/Damage = Base × Stack Count
items.detailed_description: Each hit you take creates poison cloud. Each copy increases size and damage. With Kevin (self-damage), creates permanent poison field. Essential for poison builds.
items.notes: STACKS EXTREMELY WELL: With Kevin, becomes most broken combo in the game. Creates AFK poison build.

items.name: Beacon
items.base_effect: Adds two charge shrines; area around monument becomes healing zone
items.formula: Extra Shrines = 2 × Stack Count, Healing Rate = Base × Stack Count
items.detailed_description: Each copy adds 2 more charge shrines and increases healing zone potency. With 3 copies: 6 extra shrines. Great for shrine-focused strategies.
items.notes: STACKS MODERATELY: More shrines = more upgrades, but diminishing returns on healing.

items.name: Coward's Cloak
items.base_effect: +5% movement speed; speed increases when taking damage
items.formula: Base Speed = 1 + (0.05 × Stacks), Damage Speed Boost = 0.10 × Stacks
items.detailed_description: Each copy: +5% base speed, +10% speed when hit. With 4 copies when hit: +20% base, +40% temporary speed. Great for kiting.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: More speed = better survivability and Turbo Skates synergy.

items.name: Demonic Blade
items.base_effect: Critical hits have +25% chance to heal you
items.formula: Heal on Crit Chance = 0.25 × Stack Count (capped at 100%)
items.detailed_description: 25% chance crits heal you. With 4 copies and high crit chance, constant healing. With Overcrit builds, insane sustain.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: Reaches 100% at 4 copies. Perfect for crit sustain builds.

items.name: Echo Shard
items.base_effect: Duplicates projectile effects; +12% XP gain
items.formula: Projectile Instances = Base × (1 + Stack Count), XP = 1 + (0.12 × Stacks)
items.detailed_description: Duplicates all projectile effects. Each copy creates an additional instance. With 3 copies: 3x projectiles. Multiplies damage exponentially.
items.notes: STACKS EXTREMELY WELL: Each copy multiplies projectile output. Game-breaking with projectile builds.

items.name: Golden Shield
items.base_effect: Gain gold when hit
items.formula: Gold per Hit = Base × Stack Count
items.detailed_description: Each hit generates gold. Each copy doubles gold gain. With 3 copies in high-damage environment: massive gold generation.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: More copies = more gold. Note: Kevin/Leeching Crystal reduce effectiveness.

items.name: Golden Sneakers
items.base_effect: Earn 0.1 gold per meter traveled
items.formula: Gold per Meter = 0.1 × Stack Count
items.detailed_description: Generates gold while moving. Each copy doubles rate. With high movement speed and 3 copies: 0.3 gold/meter. Passive gold generation.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: More copies + more movement = more gold. Great for mobile playstyles.

items.name: Idle Juice
items.base_effect: Gain up to +100% damage while standing still (caps at 100% per copy)
items.formula: Damage Bonus = min(Time Stationary × 0.20, 1.0) × Stack Count
items.detailed_description: Ramps to +100% damage per copy when stationary. With 3 copies: +300% damage. Strong for turret playstyles.
items.notes: STACKS VERY WELL: Each copy adds another 100% potential damage. Requires standing still.

items.name: Kevin
items.unlock_requirement: Take damage 5,000 times in one run
items.base_effect: Self-damage to trigger on-hit effects; creates poison AoE when hit (25% chance)
items.formula: Self Damage Rate = Base × Stack Count, Poison AoE Size = Base × Stack Count
items.detailed_description: Constantly procs on-damage-taken effects. With Toxic Barrel: permanent poison field. With Gas Mask: invincible. Game-breaking combo. Each copy increases proc rate and poison size.
items.notes: STACKS EXTREMELY WELL: THE most broken item combo with Toxic Barrel + Gas Mask. Creates AFK builds.

items.name: Leeching Crystal
items.base_effect: +50% max HP; health regeneration halved
items.formula: Max HP = Base × (1 + 0.50 × Stacks), Regen = Base / (2 ^ Stacks)
items.detailed_description: Each copy: +50% HP but halves regen. With 2 copies: +100% HP but 1/4 regen. Good for lifesteal builds that don't rely on regen.
items.notes: STACKS WITH CAUTION: More HP but kills your regen. Only stack with lifesteal/overheal builds.

items.name: Mirror
items.base_effect: Reflects all incoming damage; grants brief invulnerability
items.formula: Reflected Damage = Incoming Damage × (1.0 × Stack Count)
items.detailed_description: Reflects 100% damage per copy back to attackers. With 3 copies: 300% damage reflection. Also grants brief invulnerability window.
items.notes: STACKS VERY WELL: Each copy multiplies reflected damage. Strong defensive + offensive tool.

items.name: Moldy Gloves
items.unlock_requirement: Duplicate Moldy Cheese 3 times in one run
items.base_effect: Creates moldy poison cloud on hit
items.formula: Poison Cloud Size/Damage = Base × Stack Count
items.detailed_description: Each hit creates poison cloud. Each copy increases cloud size and damage. With 3 copies: massive poison zones that melt enemies.
items.notes: STACKS VERY WELL: Each copy creates larger, deadlier poison zones. Essential for poison builds.

items.name: Phantom Shroud
items.base_effect: +20% evasion; +10% movement speed
items.formula: Evasion = Internal / (1 + Internal) where Internal = 0.20 × Stacks, Speed = 1 + (0.10 × Stacks)
items.detailed_description: Evasion has diminishing returns. Speed is linear. With 5 copies: ~50% evasion, +50% speed. Essential for dodge/tank builds.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: Evasion diminishes but speed scales linearly. Great defensive item.
hidden_mechanics: Evasion uses hyperbolic formula: Actual = Internal / (1 + Internal)
1 stack (20% internal) = ~16.7% actual evasion
5 stacks (100% internal) = 50% actual evasion
Movement speed scales linearly (+10% per stack)
Graph shows hyperbolic evasion curve, speed is separate

items.name: Slurp Gloves
items.base_effect: Casts blood magic on hit (9s cooldown); AoE damage and heal 7.5%
items.formula: Heal Per Proc = 0.075 × Stack Count, Cooldown = 9s / Stack Count
items.detailed_description: Every 9s on hit: AoE damage + heal 7.5% per copy. With 3 copies: 22.5% heal and 3s cooldown. Solid sustain tool.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: More copies = more healing and faster cooldown. Steady sustain.

items.name: Thunder Mitts
items.base_effect: Every 10 seconds, strike enemies with lightning
items.formula: Lightning Strikes per Proc = Stack Count, Cooldown = 10s
items.detailed_description: Every 10s: lightning strikes. Each copy adds more strikes. With 5 copies: 5 lightning strikes every 10s. Strong passive damage.
items.notes: STACKS VERY WELL: More copies = more lightning strikes per proc. Excellent passive DPS.

items.name: Unstable Transfusion
items.base_effect: +27% chance to apply Bloodmark on hit
items.formula: Bloodmark Chance = 0.27 × Stack Count (capped at 100%)
items.detailed_description: 27% chance to apply Bloodmark. With 4 copies: guaranteed Bloodmark. Strong for Vlad and bloodmark builds.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: Reaches 100% at 4 copies. Essential for bloodmark builds.

items.name: Brass Knuckles
items.base_effect: Nearby enemies take +20% damage
items.formula: Enemy Damage Taken = 1 + (0.20 × Stack Count)
items.detailed_description: Aura that makes enemies take +20% more damage per copy. With 3 copies: enemies take +60% damage. Multiplies all damage sources.
items.notes: STACKS VERY WELL: Multiplies ALL damage to nearby enemies. Universal damage boost.

items.name: Bob (Dead)
items.base_effect: For every 14 units moved, summon Bob (ghost that damages nearby enemies)
items.formula: Bobs per 14 Units = Stack Count
items.detailed_description: Summons Bob every 14 units. Each copy summons an additional Bob. With high movement speed and 3 copies: army of Bobs.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: More copies = more Bobs = more passive damage. Great with movement.

items.name: Cactus
items.base_effect: When taking damage, shoot needles at enemies (scales with Thorns)
items.formula: Needle Damage = (Thorns Stat × Stack Count) + Base Damage
items.detailed_description: Shoots needles when hit. Damage scales with Thorns stat. Each copy adds more needles. With Kevin: constant needle barrage.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: More copies = more needles. Strong with Kevin and Thorns builds.

items.name: Campfire
items.base_effect: Stand still to spawn campfire that restores health
items.formula: Heal per Second = Base × Stack Count
items.detailed_description: Stand still to create campfire that heals. Each copy doubles healing rate. With 3 copies: 3x heal speed. Good for turret builds.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: More copies = faster healing. Requires standing still.

items.name: Credit Card (Green)
items.base_effect: +2% luck per chest opened (stacks throughout run)
items.formula: Luck = Base + (Chests Opened × 0.02 × Stack Count)
items.detailed_description: Each chest opened: +2% luck per copy. With 20 chests and 2 copies: +80% luck. Ramps throughout run.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: More copies = faster luck scaling. Strong in long runs.

items.name: Credit Card (Red)
items.base_effect: +2.5% damage per chest opened (stacks throughout run)
items.formula: Damage = 1 + (Chests Opened × 0.025 × Stack Count)
items.detailed_description: Each chest: +2.5% damage per copy. With 20 chests and 3 copies: +150% damage. Powerful ramping damage.
items.notes: STACKS VERY WELL: More copies = exponential damage scaling. Extremely strong in long runs.

items.name: Electric Plug
items.base_effect: Releases electric pulse when taking damage
items.formula: Pulse Damage = Base × Stack Count
items.detailed_description: Each hit releases electric AoE pulse. Each copy increases pulse damage. With Kevin: constant electric pulses.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: More copies = stronger pulses. Excellent with Kevin.

items.name: Feathers
items.base_effect: Increases jump duration and height by +20%
items.formula: Jump Height/Duration = Base × (1 + 0.20 × Stack Count)
items.detailed_description: Each copy adds +20% jump height/duration. With 3 copies: +60% airtime. Great for aerial builds.
items.notes: STACKS MODERATELY: More airtime = more Eagle Claw/Scarf damage. Niche but powerful.

items.name: Ghost
items.base_effect: Using objects spawns ghosts that attack enemies; grants intangibility frames
items.formula: Ghosts per Interaction = Stack Count
items.detailed_description: Each object interaction spawns ghosts. Each copy spawns more ghosts. With 4 copies: 4 ghosts per interaction.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: More copies = more ghosts. Good passive damage and utility.

items.name: Ice Crystal
items.base_effect: 7.5% chance to freeze on hit; executes low-HP enemies
items.formula: Freeze Chance = 0.075 × Stack Count
items.detailed_description: 7.5% freeze chance + execute low HP enemies. With 10 copies: 75% freeze. Also kills low-HP enemies instantly.
items.notes: STACKS VERY WELL: Higher freeze chance + built-in execute. Strong crowd control + cleanup.

items.name: Key
items.base_effect: +10% chance to open chests for free (hyperbolic)
items.formula: Free Chest Chance = Internal / (1 + Internal), where Internal = 10% per key. 1 key = ~9.1% actual.
items.detailed_description: Chance to open chests for free. Uses HYPERBOLIC SCALING - displayed percentages are misleading. 1 key = ~9.1% actual (not 10%). 5 keys = ~33% actual (not 50%). Diminishing returns make stacking less efficient.
items.notes: HYPERBOLIC: 1 key = ~9.1% actual, not 10%. Diminishing returns.
hidden_mechanics: Uses hyperbolic formula - displayed 10% is actually ~9.1%
Diminishing returns: more keys = less benefit per key
10 keys shows 100% but actual is only ~50%
Theoretical max is 50% (can never reach 100%)

items.name: Scarf
items.base_effect: +33% damage while airborne
items.formula: Airborne Damage = 1 + (0.33 × Stack Count)
items.detailed_description: Each copy: +33% damage while airborne. With 3 copies in air: +99% damage. Strong with Feathers and Eagle Claw.
items.notes: STACKS VERY WELL: Massive damage boost while airborne. Build around it.

items.name: Skuleg
items.base_effect: +7% difficulty; summons skeletal minions
items.formula: Difficulty = 1 + (0.07 × Stacks), Minions = Stack Count
items.detailed_description: Each copy: +7% difficulty and +1 skeletal minion. With 3 copies: +21% difficulty, 3 minions. Risk/reward for summon builds.
items.notes: STACKS MODERATELY: More minions but higher difficulty. Balance risk carefully.

items.name: Quin's Mask
items.unlock_requirement: Play as Athena and deliver the final blow to a Stage Boss while equipped with Aegis
items.base_effect: Thorns damage has a 50% chance to explode
items.formula: Explosion Chance = 0.50 × Stack Count (capped at 100%), Explosion Damage = Thorns × Armor Multiplier
items.detailed_description: 50% chance per copy for thorns damage to explode. Explosion damage scales with both Armor and Thorns stats. With 2 copies: 100% explosion chance. Essential for thorns builds.
items.notes: STACKS WELL UP TO 2: First copy gives 50% chance, second guarantees explosions. Additional copies provide no benefit.

items.name: Snek
items.unlock_requirement: Find secret room in Crypt - step on pressure plate in high-low platform room, enter door in lava
items.base_effect: +4 poison stacks, 5% chance to burst all poison damage instantly
items.formula: Poison Stacks = 4 × Stack Count, Burst Chance = 0.05 × Stack Count
items.detailed_description: Each copy adds +4 poison stacks to attacks and 5% chance to instantly burst all accumulated poison damage. With 5 copies: +20 poison stacks and 25% burst chance. Incredible for poison builds.
items.notes: STACKS WELL: Each copy adds +4 poison stacks and +5% burst chance. Found in Crypt secret room (Graveyard map) - locate the high-low platform room, step on pressure plate, enter hidden door in lava. Best with fast-hitting weapons.

items.name: Old Mask
items.unlock_requirement: Find at top of towers in Graveyard
items.base_effect: Increases Elite enemy spawn rate
items.formula: Elite Spawn Rate Increase = Base × (1 + 0.25 × Stack Count)
items.detailed_description: Increases the spawn rate of Elite enemies. More Elites means more challenge but also more rewards. Each copy increases Elite spawn rate by 25%.
items.notes: RISK/REWARD: More Elites spawn, increasing difficulty but also potential rewards. Found at top of towers in Graveyard.
